title: Alturas Kitchen
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Organic, Western, Take-out, Fusion, Peruvian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Offers gluten-free and some vegetarian dishes like quinoa burger, vegetarian Thai curry, veggie pizza, salads and fruit smoothies. A 15-minute walk from Plaza de Armas (Main Square), take Avenida El Sol to the Paccha (water fountain) on Avenida El Sol, turn right on Avenida Pardo.
